      • setItem

        void setItem(int slot,
             org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack)
        Sets an Item to the specified Slot
        Parameters:
        slot - the slot where the Item should be set on
        itemStack - the ItemStack which defines the Item

      • getItem

        Gets an ItemStack by the Slot
        Parameters:
        slot - the slot where the Item should get form
        Returns:
        The ItemStack of the Slot you selected
